description: Test Harbor integration by transcribing a YouTube video and summarizing it

cells.name: transcribe
cells.instructions:
Use the whisper_youtube tool to transcribe the video at: {{ input.youtube_url }}

Call the tool with:
- yt_url: the YouTube URL
- task: 'transcribe'

cells.name: summarize
cells.instructions:
Based on the transcription from the previous phase, provide a brief summary of what the video is about.

Keep the summary to 2-3 sentences.
